ProjectTitle: A multi-wavelength study to probe AGB nucleosynthesis and stellar evolution.
AllFeedback:
15/07/2022 Noted that your fellowship has been postponed until October 2023. The funder FWO, however, still expects that a Data Management Plan is submitted within 6 months of the original start data, and we need to report on this to FWO at the end of the year. There are 2 option: 1. You submit a preliminary DMP now using the FWO template; info and template here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp 2. You submit a DMP after you start next year. You may still receive reminders about the DMP, but can ignore those. 15/07/2022 Noted that your fellowship has been postponed until October 2023.
